document.title: Nijmegen Parsed Corpus of Modern Chechen
document.intro: The Nijmegen Parsed Corpus of Modern Chechen contains a number of manually corrected syntactically annotated texts. Some of the texts originally come from a corpus of Chechen texts created by Ron Zacharski & Jim Cowie at the New Mexico State University. These texts were originally avail...
